verses.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلْفِيلِ
verses.english: Have you not considered, [O Muhammad], how your Lord dealt with the companions of the elephant?
verses.hausa: Ashe, ba ka ga yadda Ubangijinka Ya aikata ga mutanen giwa ba?

verses.english: Did He not make their plan into misguidance?
verses.hausa: Ashe, bai sanya kaidinsu a cikin ɓata ba?

verses.english: And He sent against them birds in flocks,
verses.hausa: Kuma Ya sako, a kansu, wasu tsuntsãye, jama'a-jama'a.

verses.english: Striking them with stones of hard clay,
verses.hausa: Suna jifar su da wasu duwatsu na yumɓun wuta.

verses.english: And He made them like eaten straw.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan Ya sanya su kamar karmami wanda aka cinye?
